channel.title: ChaosX ~ The New 2007 Generation
channel.description:
Some of you don't know me, apparently I'm new to Mopar (I've been on google for the longest time!) But, I've had a project started and ran this server for a while but never updated or was on it (I guess you could say leeched a source and let it run), but something now told me to gain interest. Here I'll post update logs, along with on Forums.
Development Members: - Me Looking for Development Members too! But so far, I've done a lot with just me. Currently on a one-man ship, due to a hasty co-owner who only stole all the donations, and IP'd/gave out items to people, plus he didn't even know BASICS for coding! THINK YOU'RE AN ASSHOLE.
Base Used: [url=http://"http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,494813.msg3617550.html#msg3617550"]WildernessReloaded![/url]
Development Start Date: 06/11/11
- So far I've done a lot of Progress; I guess you could say. Mainly had small/non-impact updates so far. I know there's tons of "RS 2007 remakes", but I don't see anyone that's really stuck to it. When I mean 2007, I mean COMPLETE. Starting from Tutorial Island, to being 126 combat. Already constructed a mini-tutorial island (shows you around), to stick until I get to the REAL tut island. This has ALL skills working, with multiple Slayer Masters, without Summoning/Hunter. I don't like either of those shitty pointless skills. Speaking of skills, it doesn't have "torva" or any dungeoneering thing. Fixed most anims (e.g Mining was newer anim, made it back to old!)
Update Log v6/11/11: [code] Updates I've done for today: (To show that I constantly update!) - Fixed Donor Ranks (Client-Sided) - Added New Commands (Finishing up later!) - Fixed Slayer Gates (You can now take another shortcut to get to the other side!) - Ffixed Teleports (Added Normal teleports, such as Varrock Teleport, Falador Teleport, they actually move you. - Updated home teleport (it takes you straight to home.) - Took out all the "red home portals". - Fixed 1 Duping Bug I found in Duel (Creds to my mate.) - Added/Fixed Agility teleport, there's now a noticable teleport. - Added Teletabs! (Along with an Edgeville one!) - Fixed the RFD bug (NPC's didn't spawn) - Modified Combat (It's fit to perfection, credits to Moparscape for delays!)
STILL TO FIX: - More Gates (e.g Wild Gates - to get to Mage Arena)[Done; finished most all gates!] - Agility Bug (Agility is unable to reach at this moment.)[In Progress] [/code]
Update Log v6/12/11: [code] Major updates today - it doesn't look like much. But it is. A LOT. - Changed Home ~Moved Portals ~Moved NPC's - Made Shop Area - Made Portal Area - Made Thieving Area (adding portal to it tomorrow!) - Fixed Item Bonuses (Many bonuses were off.)
Still to do: - Fixing Prayers (both Ancient Prayers/Regular Players don't have working protections against all NPC's.) - Make a new Donor Area
Anything else to do? Tell me and I'll add it up here! Time: 8:57PM Eastern [/code] Had quite the Lazy Day^ Teehee.
Supporters List: [code] - None - [/code]
[b]- Don't FLAME and say I'm doing easy shit; notice that this development JUST really started, and I'm doing things from minor to major! Patching up the bugs; and taking out newer RS stuff (e.g Chaotics/Dragon Claws) -[/b]
If you want to go advanced RS (newer), you can enable PvP Zones: [IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/3333333333.png[/img] And you can use Ancient Prayers (Newest Prayers); but if you choose to stay in 2007, you can go to Wildy and you can NOT use ancient prayers!
[IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/333333333.png[/img] Teletabs.
[IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/3333333.png[/img] Regular Teleports!
[IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/33333333.png[/img] Regular Varrock Teleport (Too lazy to take pics of all)
Fixed Gates: (Only uploaded Slayer ones!) [IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/333333.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/33333.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/3333.png[/img]
Updated Home: (Unique setup for home!) [IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/33.png[/img]
Portal Area: [IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/333.png[/img]
Fixed DONOR RANKS: (Before if you made donator, it STILL wouldn't show) [IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/3.png[/img]
Ancient Prayer Models: [IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/111111111111111.png[/img]
Dueling Patch: (Can't take back items you put up for duel!) [IMG]http://i1226.photobucket.com/albums/ee402/ChaosX247/11111.png[/img]
All that i'm uploading for now. Too lazy. ;p I am also looking for client coder; server coder isn't TOO needed but it'd be great to have someone else. GRAPHIC DESIGNER IS IN NEED; I kind of made one with the RuneScape Logo (In it it says ChaosX), but I'd like to have something else! Web-Designer is in need too! I use SMF (Not the free smf sign up shit, I got real premium webhost!) Looking for someone to make a Webclient (Will pay if needbe.)
Mainly Looking For: - Website Development - GFX Artist [Got Someone] - Part-Time Server Developer (Mainly there if I need something that I can't accomplish.) I already have a VPS, and it stays online 24/7, mainly only have maybe 10+ players for bug testing. (; Not only bugs, but seeing drop rates, clipping, exp rates, skills, etc.

Offer is still up add eddieconner@live.com if you are interested.[/quote]
Mm. Added. (:

[quote=“Xx Weed Xx, post:12, topic:399020”][quote author=ApocalypseX link=topic=496155.msg3627734#msg3627734 date=1307975705]

“2007” and you have ancient curses and custom whips.

Customs = gone.
Chaotics = gone
dclaws = gone.
Attempting to remove PvP, and ancient curses are STAYING, but also not available to anyone.

What’s the point of them staying If your not going to use them.

What’s the point of spending time removing them? Lol. It’s easier just to delete the NPC that turns them on/off…

Making space meaning server wouldn’t lag as much.[/quote]
I guess you have a point. Hmph.

Read full topic

item.title: ChaosX ~ The New 2007 Generation
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Some of you don’t know me, apparently I’m new to Mopar (I’ve been on google for the longest time!)
But, I’ve had a project started and ran this server for a while but never updated or was on it (I guess you could say leeched a source and let it run), but something now told me to gain interest. Here I’ll post update logs, along with on Forums.

Development Members:

  • Me
    Looking for Development Members too! But so far, I’ve done a lot with just me.
    Currently on a one-man ship, due to a hasty co-owner who only stole all the donations, and IP’d/gave out items to people, plus he didn’t even know BASICS for coding! THINK YOU’RE AN ASSHOLE.

Base Used:
WildernessReloaded!

Development Start Date:
06/11/11

  • So far I’ve done a lot of Progress; I guess you could say. Mainly had small/non-impact updates so far.
    I know there’s tons of “RS 2007 remakes”, but I don’t see anyone that’s really stuck to it. When I mean 2007, I mean COMPLETE. Starting from Tutorial Island, to being 126 combat. Already constructed a mini-tutorial island (shows you around), to stick until I get to the REAL tut island. This has ALL skills working, with multiple Slayer Masters, without Summoning/Hunter. I don’t like either of those shitty pointless skills. Speaking of skills, it doesn’t have “torva” or any dungeoneering thing. Fixed most anims (e.g Mining was newer anim, made it back to old!)

Update Log v6/11/11:

Updates I've done for today: (To show that I constantly update!)
- Fixed Donor Ranks (Client-Sided)
- Added New Commands (Finishing up later!)
- Fixed Slayer Gates (You can now take another shortcut to get to the other side!)
- Ffixed Teleports (Added Normal teleports, such as Varrock Teleport, Falador Teleport, they actually move you.
- Updated home teleport (it takes you straight to home.)
- Took out all the "red home portals".
- Fixed 1 Duping Bug I found in Duel (Creds to my mate.)
- Added/Fixed Agility teleport, there's now a noticable teleport.
- Added Teletabs! (Along with an Edgeville one!)
- Fixed the RFD bug (NPC's didn't spawn)
- Modified Combat (It's fit to perfection, credits to Moparscape for delays!)

STILL TO FIX:
- More Gates (e.g Wild Gates - to get to Mage Arena)[Done; finished most all gates!]
- Agility Bug (Agility is unable to reach at this moment.)[In Progress]

Update Log v6/12/11:

Major updates today - it doesn't look like much. But it is. A LOT.
- Changed Home
~Moved Portals
~Moved NPC's
- Made Shop Area
- Made Portal Area
- Made Thieving Area (adding portal to it tomorrow!)
- Fixed Item Bonuses (Many bonuses were off.)

Still to do:
- Fixing Prayers (both Ancient Prayers/Regular Players don't have working protections against all NPC's.)
- Make a new Donor Area

Anything else to do? Tell me and I'll add it up here!
Time: 8:57PM Eastern

Had quite the Lazy Day^ Teehee.

Supporters List:

- None -

- Don’t FLAME and say I’m doing easy shit; notice that this development JUST really started, and I’m doing things from minor to major! Patching up the bugs; and taking out newer RS stuff (e.g Chaotics/Dragon Claws) -

If you want to go advanced RS (newer), you can enable PvP Zones:

And you can use Ancient Prayers (Newest Prayers); but if you choose to stay in 2007, you can go to Wildy and you can NOT use ancient prayers!


Teletabs.


Regular Teleports!


Regular Varrock Teleport (Too lazy to take pics of all)

Fixed Gates: (Only uploaded Slayer ones!)


Updated Home: (Unique setup for home!)

Portal Area:

Fixed DONOR RANKS: (Before if you made donator, it STILL wouldn’t show)

Ancient Prayer Models:

Dueling Patch: (Can’t take back items you put up for duel!)

All that i’m uploading for now. Too lazy. ;p
I am also looking for client coder; server coder isn’t TOO needed but it’d be great to have someone else.
GRAPHIC DESIGNER IS IN NEED; I kind of made one with the RuneScape Logo (In it it says ChaosX), but I’d like to have something else!
Web-Designer is in need too! I use SMF (Not the free smf sign up shit, I got real premium webhost!)
Looking for someone to make a Webclient (Will pay if needbe.)

Mainly Looking For:

  • Website Development
  • GFX Artist [Got Someone]
  • Part-Time Server Developer (Mainly there if I need something that I can’t accomplish.)
    I already have a VPS, and it stays online 24/7, mainly only have maybe 10+ players for bug testing. (;
    Not only bugs, but seeing drop rates, clipping, exp rates, skills, etc.

Read full topic
